attributes.review: As soon as I downloaded this app, my phone started glitching. My apps freeze and completely close, and sometimes my phone restarts completely, even when I’m on the phone. Mr trump inspired me to become a businessman, but now his app makes my phone glitch so much and with such frequency that I am beginning to lose clients because it will shut down when I am on the phone with them. Mind you, this has only started since I downloaded this app, and nothing else has happened to it to cause this. Also, his flabby turkey neck in his Goodwill suits so closely resembles my grandmothers hoo-ha that I threw up as soon as I opened the app (but none got on my phone!) I was overwhelmed with the amount of racist and pedophilic rhetoric on this app. On there he actually accounts how it’s okay to harass 13 year old girls! I was appalled by the racism, because it seems trump tries so hard to be tan, but hates his brownskinned counterparts. The app also asked for permission to have my location and phone number, which is grossly inappropriate because I am afraid of trumps close associates coming to assault and harass me given my age and gender. Also, does anyone have any theories as to why his hair is so yellow? My liberal, biracial, bisexual, transgender, aunt of Russian and Chinese descent said that the yellow color comes from all the golden showers trump takes. I guess that must mean his shower water has a lot of iron in it. Oh well, I pray to Lucifer himself that trump is able to take a clear shower instead of a warm golden one soon, hopefully just as soon as I am getting my abortion next week for the baby my black neighbor put inside me.
attributes.title: ABSOLUTELY HORRIBLE!!!
